item.title: Heroes of the Borderlands
item.description:
Heroes of the Borderlands#

A Remastered Wild and Wacky Adventure#

Status: ✅ Completed
System: D&D 5e Theme: Comedy, Chaos

Campaign Overview#

A remastered adventure of the old AD&D adventures books that I ran online which now the remastered is 5e 2024 supported.

What Made It Special#

Loot System: Weapons and items with Borderlands-style rarity and effects.

Tone: Nothing was too serious, everything was cranked to 11.

Player Freedom: The party could approach problems in the most absurd ways possible.

item.title: Melancholic Path of Caer Abrah
item.description:
Melancholic Path of Caer Abrah#

A Journey after the End#

Status: ✅ Completed
System: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons 2E (Adnd 2e)
Theme: What cames after the End ?

Campaign Overview#

The joruney start when the players wake up in a foggy jungle they were told they are passed and to go into the After Life they need to find doors to Caer Abrah. The journey would be unforgiving and with many-many obstacles. Those who fell became the forgotten those who reach Caer Abrah can enter the After Life.

item.title: Jungle of Jyggalag
item.description:
Jungle of Jyggalag#

A Short Daggerheart Adventure#

Status: ✅ Completed
System: Daggerheart (Darrington Press)
Theme: Mystery, Jungle Exploration, System Test

Campaign Overview#

A short-form campaign designed to explore the Daggerheart system by Darrington Press. Set in a mysterious jungle connected to Jyggalag, players experienced a different kind of TTRPG system while still maintaining narrative depth.

This campaign served as both an adventure and a learning experience for trying out new mechanics:
